recommendations: 🚨 Address CRITICAL issues immediately - these prevent basic functionality
⚠️ Fix ERROR issues - these cause runtime problems in Foundry VTT
📝 Review WARNING issues - these may affect user experience
🔧 Use the Item Linker Agent to fix UUID references
